abstract: While Google introduced its first piece of hardware, the Nexus One cellphone, Apple began to take aim at advertising, Google’s bread and butter.
snippet: While Google introduced its first piece of hardware, the Nexus One cellphone, Apple began to take aim at advertising, Google’s bread and butter.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Apple encroached upon Google’s turf on Tuesday with its acquisition of Quattro Wireless, a mobile advertising company.

headline.main: Apple Buys Quattro, an Ad Firm
headline.print_headline: Apple Buys Quattro, An Ad Firm
